thread.title: MAFS stars Jules and Cam share their sweetest moments with son Oliver
thread.title_full: MAFS stars Jules and Cam share their sweetest moments with son Oliver

title: MAFS stars Jules and Cam share their sweetest moments with son Oliver
text:
Jules Robinson and Cam Merchant welcomed their long-awaited baby boy on September 29, 2020.
Their family has grown from two to three with the addition of Oliver Chase Merchant, and he is such a cutie!
To celebrate their gorgeous little family, here are a few of the Ollie's sweetest moments shared by his parents.
The festivities certainly haven't stopped in the Jules and Cam household!
In January 2024, Cam celebrated a massive milestone ‚Äì his 40th birthday ‚Äì with a fun-filled soir√©e joined by friends and family.
"You're living, walking example of what a good human is "‚ù§Ô∏è Happy 40th birthday to my
@cammerchant‚Ä¶" Jules captioned the snaps to
Inspired by everything Cam loves, Jules surprised her husband with a garden party complete with live music, catering, cocktails and "the best salted caramel cake. Ever."
"That's what he wanted! That's what he got!" Jules added.
"A little extravaganza I whipped up in 5 days üòÇ," she said. "All the feels for anyone and their partners whose birthday is the first week of January! üòÇ."
Sharing a video of her speech from the night, Jules said: "Welcome to the club! Everyone here would agree you are the most kindest, most beautiful human. You make me want to be a better person... I am so, so proud and so lucky to be your wife so thank you."
Cam thanked everyone with his own sweet message, scroll through to see what he had to say...
"Thank you to so many for all your love & incredible birthday wishes turning 40 ü•≥," Cam wrote alongside a string of photos.
"Just recovered from a memorable evening (day after is certainly evident & a little trickier at 40 üòÇ) but truly grateful for the people I have in my life that have been there for me along the way.
"Thank you
@julesrobinson82 for creating an amazing evening & knowing the way to my heart."
In November 2023 ‚Äì shortly after she and Cam celebrated their fourth wedding anniversary ‚Äì Jules posted this sweet photo online alongside their son Oliver, three.
In the caption, she shared the sweetest message about her relationship with the tot, and fans absolutely loved it.
"Not one to gloat üòâ but when my son was asked at kindy today who his best friend was he said me. Mummy ü•∞," she beamed in the caption.
"#heartmelt sorry not sorry hubby üòÇ. I'm sure he will change his mind tomorrow! üòâ!"
Jules' followers were obsessed by the adorable post, with one writing: "That is too sweet! ü•∞ I love that answer so much."
"Adorable little Ollie ‚ù§Ô∏è," another wrote, while a third added: "Such a beautiful photo! üß°."
Time flies when you're in love!
Jules Robinson and Cameron Merchant will be celebrating their
four-year wedding anniversary on November 17.
Their MAFS wedding celebrant has pipped them to the post and sent them an early anniversary gift.
"When your MAFS celebrant sends you your vows for your anniversary ," Jules captioned a post.
"Thank you so much @trent_the_celebrant so thoughtful, so kind, and I can't believe you kept them all this time!!"
Jules went on to share a quote from part of her vows.
"Even though I am an incredibly strong woman, I'm whole heartily ready to love and be loved in return. I'm ready to belly laugh with someone I take very serious.
"In the wise words of Carrie Bradshaw, I am someone looking for real love, ridiculous, inconvenient, consuming, can't live without each other love."
Congratulations to the happy couple!
After spending months in the UK, the family finally returned to Australia in October 2023.
"We did it!" Jules wrote as she shared a picture of herself, Cam and Oliver beaming at Sydney Airport.
After over 24 hours of travel, Jules added: "Bring on the jet lag!"
Jules had been promoting her shapewear brand FIGUR in Europe.
She told 9Entertainment that she loved the experience, and so did little Oliver.
"I hope this is his first memory; I hope he remembers that he's the most well-travelled little three-year-old that's living his best life!" Jules laughed.
The family had something big to celebrate in September 2023... it's Oliver's birthday!
To commemorate the tot turning three, Jules and Cam took their son out while he was dressed as a very adorable dinosaur.
The duo surprised Oli with a trip to Paradise Wildlife Park in the UK for an adventure-filled celebration, and it looks like Oliver had a whale of a time.
"Safe to say he thought today was awesome," Jules wrote alongside a snap of her son.
How cute!
Taking it back to the day Ollie's parents first met... and tied the knot on the same day!
It's been five wonderful years since the stars
met and fell in love on Married At First Sight, and Cam has shared the most heartfelt post to celebrate it.
"I want a person who comes into my life by accident, but stays on purpose‚ù§Ô∏è," he captioned the photos.
"Cannot believe it's been five years since I met my best friend for the first time in
@julesrobinson82 & got married sight unseen.
"Still feel it was one of the best days I've ever experienced.. & never would you think that in some of these photos we've only known each other for a matter of hours.."
So was it love at first sight?
Cam said: "We are both so open to agree that it was definitely Vibe at First Sight. There was something special, kind, supportive and warm about our first connection and it's only become stronger.
"These five years have been special & can't wait to share so many more with you. Happy Love Day my everything ‚ù§Ô∏è."
Fans rushed to the comments to share sweet messages for the pair.
"Where you fell in love with each other‚Ä¶ and we all fell in love with you both," wrote one follower, while another said: "Loved watching your love develop on the show and look at you both now with little Ollie... two people couldn't deserve it any more ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è."
A third added: "Best match in the history of the show, in ALL countries! Just love you two xxx."
Jules replied with her own sweet message for Cam. Scroll through to see what she said.
"Five years ago today I met my husband, and we really did commit to all the words we shared that day," Jules wrote in her own
post this week.
"I'd chose you in a thousand lifetimes, in any version of reality, I'd find you and I'd chose you‚Ä¶.
@cammerchant.
"I love you‚Ä¶.Thank you to
#mafs for helping me find you this time üòâ #tailormade #handpicked."
MAFS UK bride Sophie Brown was one of the first to comment on Jules touching post. "I've NEVER seen love at first sight like you two locking eyes, what a moment it was üò´," she said.
"Fave MAFS couple ever ever ever!! ‚ù§Ô∏è," wrote a fan.
Aww, it's definitely a love story for the ages!
Jules shared this adorable photo of herself, Cameron and little Oliver in September 2023.
"Hanging with Ken, sorry Cam on daddy's day," Jules wrote, in a funny reference to the Barbie movie.
The picture was taken in London, where the family are currently staying as Jules has some work in the UK.
Fans all said the same thing about the image, with one writing: "Might be the most gorgeous pics on IG!"
"Nothing matters more than that little unit you have right there... gorgeous," another wrote.
Many also asked similar questions about the family's living arrangements, with one writing: "How long you you guys in London for? I must of missed the reasons you guys went there for?"
"Have you relocated here in the UK?" another asked.
The family have been spending time in Europe for the past few months, and have travelled to a number of countries during that time.
It's not know how long they plan to stay overseas, but Jules previously lived in the UK for 14 years and thinks of it as a second home.
Discussing if the family's UK visit could one day be a more permanent one, Jules recently told
OK! Magazine: "I feel like I'm at home when I'm in England. We'd never say never and Ollie is at a great age to travel with."
Ollie is growing up so quickly!
Jules shared a cute mother-son moment on
In the most recent picture, both Jules and Ollie are wearing sunglasses.
"Yeah my kid is cool," she captioned the post.
"Pic 1 (left) taken today and pic 2 (right) taken 1 year ago in 2 weeks time! Where did 2022 go?!"
Her fans were quick to praise the cute duo.
"Cherish every moment as I know you do. Time passes to quickly and nothing will slow it down," one wrote.
Another wrote, "Omg he looks so like his dad!!"
While a third commented: "Wish you would have another one."
Ollie is not so little anymore!
He's just turned two, and proud parents Jules and Cam were very eager to celebrate the special occasion.
The pair took to their social media accounts in September to wish their son a very happy birthday, while showing what the little one got up to on the big day.
It included a lot of cupcakes, some jumping on his new trampoline and... more cake!
The pair also uploaded
a sweet video of Ollie and special moments they've shared together as a family since he was born.
"You light up a room, may those eyes sparkle like they do forever. We love you so much. You make out life even more sweet! My baby is 2!"
Jules wrote.
Cam posted this adorable snap of Ollie, who was clearly living his best life and eating as much cake as possible.
"You can smash cupcakes anytime on your birthday mate!"
Cam captioned the snap.
He also included a timestamp and it wasn't even 8:30am yet!
The birthday boy also had a visit from Cam's mum and enjoyed some special time with his Nonna.
After some well deserved cake, the family of three jumped around on Ollie's brand new trampoline.
The trampoline also included a basketball hoop, so Cam had to teach his little mini-me how to shoot some hoops.
"Dad putting on a show for the birthday boy!" Cam captioned on
his Instagram story.
Ollie seemed preoccupied, but Cam threw the ball behind his head and celebrated after making the shot.
While the family celebrated Ollie's actual birthday day at home with quiet celebrations, Jules mentioned there's still a party to come!
He's not even two years old, but Jules and Cam's son Ollie is already doting after his mum.
Jules uploaded this
adorable snap of Ollie trying to feed her with a bottle.
"He just wants to look after his mother üòÇ. Don't worry Ollie in 50 years you will be," she captioned the post.
Fans were quick to notice Ollie's sweet nature.
"He's a caring boy lucky mumma," one commented.
"He loves his mama," another wrote.
Jules is clearly soaking in every moment of motherhood she can.
We can all agree that a night without sleep is never fun, but this gorgeous snap proves Jules is making the most of even the hardest times.
"Wide awake from 3am to finally drift back to sleep around 6am with this little one. I swear he grew in three hours!"
she captioned a series of pictures on Instagram.
"So cute, enjoy they grow so quickly," one follower commented.
Another wrote, "So beautiful. Enjoy every second Jules, before you know it he'll be a man and you'll never get this time back."
"Those nights are long, hope you get some rest time today," wrote another fan.
Since becoming a mum, Jules has shared plenty of raw and unfiltered moments with her followers and this is definitely one of them.
She's struggling with a broken arm, which she recently underwent surgery for and parenting with the injury has been a challenge, which she opened up about on Instagram.
"#realparenthood I tell you what‚Ä¶ If this broken arm has any lesson‚Ä¶ it's that I actually can live in pure dumpster. Not even an organised mess!"
she captioned the post.
"This was a result of two extremely busy months, to then actually not physically being able to fix it up! I hate it, it's doing my head in. But he is happy, and loves playing in it and life goes on‚Ä¶ my point is‚Ä¶The world won't end if your house isn't perfect‚Ä¶ Will share in six weeks when I can physically sort my personal tornado made by me!"
Jules' followers praised her in the comments for keeping it real.
Even husband Cam commented, "You have no idea how much this makes me happy. All will be ok hun I promise."
Cam and Jules are clearly loving every moment of being parents, but there's one thing Jules in particular is getting excited about.
Sharing a gorgeous family snap on Instagram, Jules feels like Ollie is finally starting to look like her.
"Potentially, just, maybe, see a hint, flicker, tinnyyyyy piece of me in Ollie here... Tiny,"
she captioned the snap.
Her followers loved the photo and had a lot of varying opinions on who Ollie really looks like.
"He is a beautiful combination of you both," wrote one follower.
Another commented, "I noticed the other day that you are finally getting a look in."
"So funny... before I read your words... I was looking at Ollie... and thinking...where is his mum... all his dad sorry to say Jules lol," wrote another.
While her followers may be divided on who Ollie looks like, one thing is for sure, they are a gorgeous little family!
Ollie is growing up fast and recently hit another big milestone!
Jules posted an adorable video of Ollie on her
Baby Cub account as he played with a calendar at home and turns out he's learnt a new word.
"Ok mama and dada is there. But first OFFICIAL word is PUPPY! Think he is trying to tell us something,"
https://www.instagram.com/p/CdkTc4tPZN7/.
In the short clip a very excited Cam asked Oliver what the pictures are in the calendar, to which he replied "Puppy!".
Jules' followers flooded the post with comments, urging the couple to get a dog because clearly, Ollie wants one.
"Go on! You know you want one! He'd be happy with the pictures for a while!" commented one follower.
Another wrote, "Aww bless. I mean, you can't not get a puppy now."
Jules, Cam and Ollie recently returned from a luxurious family trip to Fiji ‚Äî which was also the finale of her festival of 40 celebrations.
While it was a fabulous holiday, these snaps from Jules look like it's well and truly back to reality now.
"Was feeling the holiday glow, then someone had a little accident and became bilingual. P.S he is fine now,"
https://www.instagram.com/p/CcsAcRFrtLK/.
In one image Ollie is flashing a cheeky grin to the camera while they snap a selfie. But she also posted a video, showing the stitches on his head covered by a bandage. Ollie is talking absolute gibberish, but clearly very happy about it.
"Awww this is the cutest thing I've seen in a while!" commented one follower.
Another suggested that Ollie was just trying to speak Irish.
But Ollie's little bump on the head doesn't seem to be bothering him and they also enjoyed a family day out at The Wiggles concert.
"Fruit Salad Class of '22'üçèüçâüçìüçåPlenty of fun, so involved & loved it‚Ä¶ Ollie did too‚Ä¶üòÇ Thanks for putting on a show @thewiggles Currently still humming in my head,"
Cam captioned a series of posts from the day.
Judging by these snaps, Cam and Jules may have had more fun than Ollie too.
